overview:
cloudflare-full: 23 tools; cloudflare_create_api_token -> Create scoped Cloudflare API token programmatically.

    Creates a new API token with specific permissions., cloudflare_create_firewall_rule -> Create custom firewall rule with action and filter expression.

    Creates a new firewall rule t..., cloudflare_create_kv_namespace -> Create Workers KV namespace for key-value storage.

    Creates a new KV namespace container for ..., cloudflare_create_page_rule -> Create page rule for URL pattern with caching, redirects, or security actions.

    Page rules customize Cloudflare behavior for specific URL patterns., cloudflare_delete_firewall_rule -> Delete firewall rule., cloudflare_delete_kv -> Delete key from KV namespace., cloudflare_delete_page_rule -> Delete page rule., cloudflare_delete_worker -> Delete Worker script., cloudflare_deploy_worker -> Deploy/update Worker script with JavaScript content.

    Uploads and deploys a Worker script., cloudflare_get_account -> Get account details including name, settings, and capabilities.

    Returns comprehensive accoun..., cloudflare_get_cache_settings -> Get zone cache configuration including level and browser TTL.

    Args:
        params: GetCache..., cloudflare_get_ssl_settings -> Get SSL/TLS configuration including mode and certificate status.

    Args:
        params: GetSS..., cloudflare_get_worker -> Get Worker script content by name.

    Retrieves the JavaScript source code of a deployed Worker..., cloudflare_get_zone_analytics -> Get zone analytics/stats for traffic, requests, and bandwidth.

    Returns analytics data includ..., cloudflare_list_firewall_rules -> List firewall rules with filters and IDs for management.

    Returns all configured firewall rul..., cloudflare_list_kv_keys -> List keys in KV namespace with optional prefix filter.

    Returns all keys stored in the KV namespace., cloudflare_list_kv_namespaces -> List Workers KV namespaces with IDs for storage operations.

    Returns all KV namespaces in the..., cloudflare_list_page_rules -> List page rules with URL patterns, actions, and IDs.

    Returns all configured page rules for a..., cloudflare_list_workers -> List deployed Workers scripts with IDs and metadata.

    Returns all deployed Workers scripts in..., cloudflare_purge_cache -> Purge cache by URLs, tags, hosts, prefixes, or everything.

    Immediately invalidates cached content., cloudflare_read_kv -> Read value by key from KV namespace.

    Retrieves the value stored under the specified key in t..., cloudflare_update_ssl_settings -> Modify SSL mode (off, flexible, full, strict).

    Changes how Cloudflare connects to your origin server., cloudflare_write_kv -> Write key-value pair to KV namespace with optional TTL.

    Stores a value under a key in the specified KV namespace.
